channel.title: Me Singing + Guitaring Hallelujah. ;o
channel.description:
Ha. I bothered to actually upload this to YouTube. My hair is not naturally like that, i'd just gotten out of the shower, so it's wet. ;)
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nYkkJbAHbbg
I suck, psh. Ignore the mistakes.. Didn't warmup, so my vocal range kind of went shit.

item.title: Me Singing + Guitaring Hallelujah. ;o
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

Still a super hotty.

Read full topic

item.title: Me Singing + Guitaring Hallelujah. ;o
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“Iamadam, post:11, topic:51287”][quote author=XxKanexX link=topic=71891.msg823895#msg823895 date=1169811390]

Someone has hit a very, very unfortunate puberty.

Lol once your voice settles I’d say your singing would improve greatly. You got the technique and range hands down

Now when shall you be picking up your Electric and start screaming your lungs out?
Lol I’m assuming you copied this chick?

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vVxDXbLt3YI

That’s where i got the idea for the song from. She’s great.
I don’t quite scream my lungs out but i love crankin’ the Electric to high volume and shitting of the neighbours, lol.
I’m hoping for my voice to improve as it settles. Thanks.
My range sucks, though. But i guess i have the restriction of my voice changing at the moment.

Kane’s a super hotty.

Ha-Ha. no.
[/quote]
Hah. The best way to improve your range is to sing heaps. I do music in school, so unfortunately I have to sing in the choir (it’s actually not that bad - my friends and I manage to ‘make’ it fun ). When I started, I struggled to hit a C. Now I can get up to G on a good day (in full voice, not falcetto lawl).[/quote]
I sing heaps.

I can sing to about F. In falcetto i can go alot higher, though.

Read full topic

Lol once your voice settles I’d say your singing would improve greatly. You got the technique and range hands down

Now when shall you be picking up your Electric and start screaming your lungs out?

[/quote]
That’s where i got the idea for the song from. She’s great.
I don’t quite scream my lungs out but i love crankin’ the Electric to high volume and shitting of the neighbours, lol.
I’m hoping for my voice to improve as it settles. Thanks.
My range sucks, though. But i guess i have the restriction of my voice changing at the moment.

Kane’s a super hotty.

Ha-Ha. no.[/quote]
Hah. The best way to improve your range is to sing heaps. I do music in school, so unfortunately I have to sing in the choir (it’s actually not that bad - my friends and I manage to ‘make’ it fun ). When I started, I struggled to hit a C. Now I can get up to G on a good day (in full voice, not falcetto lawl).
